MaskingMapplet.XmlData: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?><!DOCTYPE POWERMART SYSTEM "powrmart.dtd"><POWERMART CREATION_DATE="06/21/2017 07:27:48" REPOSITORY_VERSION="184.93"><REPOSITORY OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Input Transformation" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="i1_dob" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="i1_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="to_char(i1_dob)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="i_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(i_dob,1,LENGTH(i_dob)-2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="i_rest" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(i_dob,-2,2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="i_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Tracing Level" VALUE ="Normal"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS1" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_rest" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_CHAR(DECODE(to_integer(i_day),01,11,02,12,03,13,04,14,05,15,06,16,07,17,08,18,09,19,10,20,11,21,12,22,13,23,14,24,15,25,16,26,17,27,18,28,19,01,20,02,21,03,22,04,23,05,24,06,25,07,26,08,27,09,28,10,29,21,30,22,31,23,00,00))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="LPAD(v_day,2,'0')" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_dd" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION =" i_rest || v_dd" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="to_integer(iif(isnull(i_dob) or i_dob=0,i_dob,to_integer(v_masked_dob)))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="final_output" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Tracing Level" VALUE ="Normal"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="OUTPUT" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE
